SH is dead, but partially reanimated to answer questions. Fragmented, no awareness of surrounds or deceased status

Synopsis:
Speak with Dead dialogue with Shadowheart, where she dies without having been recruited into the party. The player can ask her questions - her responses are short and cryptic (limted to five questions). If they already took the mysterious gith artefact from her, they can ask her about it.
If SH died offscreen after the player fled from her while she was hostile, and they then camped, they have a couple of extra questions that hint at what happened to her.
